ygData.subject: This weekend
ygData.msgSnippet: Over this past weekend, I managed to buy an almost full set of bronze armor. I was very happy. However the big find I made had me rolling on the floor. I was
ygData.messageBody:
Over this past weekend, I managed to buy an almost full set of bronze armor.
I was very happy. However the big find I made had me rolling on the floor. I
was in Rathe Mountains selling at the gypsie camp when for the hell of it I
started looking at what she had to sell. The very last item in her list was
a Silvery War Axe (1HS, 6/22, magic: buy from a player for 250 pp). With 104
charisma, she sold it for under 6 pp! I was so excited that I accidentally
bought a FS Scimitar for 56pp! Even though I wasted 51pp, I still made out
like a bandit. That reminds me. Why is a Combine Scimi 14pp less than a FS
Scimi? It makes no sense, neither does the axe being less than a Kite
shield. Oh well. :-)

I'm not quite ready to start playing Lasombra yet, need to double check
where I put my starting points. I may need to recreate him based on the
advise you have given me. The time is close though, I am getting tired of
not being able to melee as well as I would like. I lost and regained 26th
level 4 times in one day this weekend, I was not happy.

Any suggestions for hunting grounds after say 9th level? Thanks.

--
Lasombra
1st Tier of Hate
